original_text:
He will shake off his unripe grape like the vine,
    and cast off his blossom like the olive tree.
korean_text: 포도 열매가 익기 전에 떨어짐 같고 감람 꽃이 곧 떨어짐 같으리라

sentences.original_text: He will shake off his unripe grape like the vine,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 포도나무처럼 그의 익지 않은 포도를 흔들어 떨어뜨릴 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and cast off his blossom like the olive tree.
sentences.korean_translation: 올리브 나무처럼 그의 꽃을 떨어뜨릴 것입니다.
